lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic survived a second set challenge to dismiss eighth-seeded Leonardo Mayer of Argentina 6-3, 7-5 to reach the Qatar Open semifinal Thursday.
snippet: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic survived a second set challenge to dismiss eighth-seeded Leonardo Mayer of Argentina 6-3, 7-5 to reach the Qatar Open semifinal Thursday....

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Joins Rafael Nadal in Qatar Open Semifinals
headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic Joins Rafael Nadal in Qatar Open Semifinals
